Policies: Cancellation Policy - No Refund, If Canceled 15 Days Before The Event. If Cancelled Within 3 Days Of Booking & Event Date Is More Than 15 Days Away - Full Refund. If Cancelled After 3 Days Of Booking & Event Date Is More Than 15 Days Away - Get 50% Of Advance Back.

Other Information.Brand Used: MAC, Maybelline, Loreal, Lakme, LA Girl, Color Essence, Colorbar Etc
